attributes.action: reduce fuel duty permantley to ease the recession
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the most recent Mini-Budget to help the uk out of a recession, VAT has been cut, This cut is unlikely to reach us the consumer due to the costs of mass re-pricing, Duty is up on alcohol and tobacco to offset the vat cut but the motorist is hit the hardest with 2p on a litre of fuel, this is unacceptable and is a back handed way to tax us more without choice

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
